name: Perfect Ki Adept
summary: You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection.
description:
You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: unblinking flame revelation for Unblinking Flame, unbreaking wave advance for Unbreaking Waves, unfolding wind rush for Unfolding Wind, or untwisting iron buffer for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
